comment: I love this app soo much, I always check it in the day twice or thrice but nowadays whenever I open the app and see a nice pin I save it in my board and it's doesn't get saved. It shows 'Save failed' and whenever i download a pin that same thing happens so if I uninstall it would be not good so rather you guys fix it please ASAP!!!!
scenarios: User opens the app, tries to save a pin to a board, but gets a "Save failed" message, meaning the pin does not get saved.
User downloads a pin and encounters the same "Save failed" issue.
key sentence: User opens the app, tries to save a pin to a board, but gets a "Save failed" message, meaning the pin does not get saved.
the function of activity: Activity involves searching, accessing menus, filtering, viewing various content categories, managing pins, profiles, settings, creating, sharing, and navigating within the interface.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'View Image', 'description': 'View a larger version of an image or pin on the screen.'}, {'name': 'Save Pin', 'description': 'Save a pin or item to a collection or board for later reference.'}, {'name': 'Share', 'description': 'Share content via various platforms or methods such as social media or messaging.'}, {'name': 'View Comments', 'description': 'Read and engage with comments associated with a pin or post.'}]
